properties.Name: Keruen-saray - "Kazakhstan Venice"
properties.Short_desc: The largest tourist complex in Central Asia: low buildings with sand-colored domes.

properties.Name: Barsakelmes Island
properties.Location: 180 kilometers southwest of the city of Aralsk, Kyzylorda region
properties.Short_desc: Barsakelmes is a former island in the Aral Sea. Barsakelmes means "if you go, you won't come back".

properties.Name: Mausoleum of Khoja Ahmed Yasawi
properties.Short_desc: The structure was commissioned in 1389 by Timur, who ruled the area as part of the expansive Timurid Empire, to replace a smaller one of 12th-century

properties.Name: Singing dune
properties.Location: 300 km northeast of the city of Almaty
properties.Short_desc: Singing Dunes is a phenomenon of nature, famous for the fact that when the weather is dry the sand dune emits a sound similar to the tune of organ.

properties.Name: Charyn Canyon
properties.Location: 195 km east of Almaty, near the border with China
properties.Short_desc: Charyn Canyon is a canyon on the Sharyn River in Kazakhstan and a part of the Charyn National Park

properties.Name: Underground mosque Beket-ata
properties.Location: 95 km northeast of Senek village in Mangistau region
properties.Short_desc: Beket Ata Underground Mosque is associated with the name of Beket Myrzagululy, an Islamic mystic who is revered as a saint by Sufi Muslims.

properties.Name: Khan Tengri mountain peak
properties.Short_desc: Khan Tengri is a mountain of the Tian Shan mountain range. It is on the China—Kyrgyzstan—Kazakhstan tripoint, east of lake Issyk Kul.

properties.Name: Medeu-Shymbulak
properties.Short_desc: Medeu is an outdoor speed skating and bandy rink. Shymbulak is the largest ski resort in Central Asia.

properties.Name: Quarry "Blue Lagoon"
properties.Short_desc: The blue lagoon of Astana has a fictitious name given by locals because of the unusual contrast of watercolors, which are surrounded by limestone rocks.

properties.Name: Merke Turkic Sanctuaries
properties.Location: near the village of Merke in Zhambyl region
properties.Short_desc: The material and spiritual culture of the Turks is expressed and embodied in the burial and ritual complexes of their sanctuaries.

properties.Name: Pink lake Kobeytuz
properties.Location: near the city of Yerementau, 179 kilometers northeast of Astana
properties.Short_desc: Kobeytuz is one of just a few such lakes in the world, its waters rendered pink by the presence of algae called Dunaliella Salina

properties.Name: Okzhetpes and Zhumbaktas
properties.Location: in the center of the Blue Bay of Lake Borovoe, Akmola region
properties.Short_desc: The Zhumbaktas Rock and Okzhetpes Mountain have one common history and appear to be the most attractive places of the National Park Burabay.

properties.Name: Aerial lift
properties.Short_desc: Aerial lift connects the Medeo sports complex and the Shymbulak Ski Base

properties.Name: Glade of Abylai Khan
properties.Location: at the eastern part of Mount Kokshetau, Akmola region
properties.Short_desc: Glade has a special microclimate. It is believed that walking on it and the air of the coniferous forest helps to improve human health.

properties.Name: The Astana Grand Mosque
properties.Short_desc: It is the largest mosque in Central Asia and one of the largest in the world.

properties.Name: Arystanbab Mausoleum
properties.Short_desc: One of the holiest places in the Turkistan Province is the Mausoleum of Arystan Bab, founded in the 12th century.

properties.Name: Cave Kenesary
properties.Location: 6 km from the sanatorium Okzhetpes in Borovoe, Akmola region
properties.Short_desc: One of the iconic places of the Burabay National Park is named after Kenesary Khan, Kazakh national hero.

properties.Name: Kazakh Switzerland
properties.Short_desc: There are 24 nature protection zones in the region, more than 600 historical monuments and over 100 objects of tourist interest.

properties.Name: Kabanbay Batyr Mausoleum
properties.Short_desc: Kabanbai Batyr Mausoleum, located in the vicinity of the capital of Kazakhstan, is an iconic place for the Kazakh people

properties.Name: Petroglyphs of Tanbaly
properties.Short_desc: Set around the lush Tanbaly Gorge, amidst the vast, arid Chu-Ili mountains, is a remarkable concentration of some 5,000 petroglyphs (rock carvings)
